content.question: For a certain population of sea turtles, 18 percent are longer than 6.5 feet. A random sample of 90 sea turtles will be selected. What is the standard deviation of the sampling distribution of the sample proportion of sea turtles longer than 6.5 feet for samples of size 90 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction, 6.5 times, open parenthesis, 18 minus 6.5, close parenthesis over 90" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.5</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6.5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>90</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.18 times, open parenthesis, 1 minus 0.18, close parenthesis over 90" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.18</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.18</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>90</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.18 times, open parenthesis, 1 minus 0.18, close parenthesis over 6.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.18</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.18</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>6.5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 18 times, open parenthesis, 90 minus 18, close parenthesis over 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>18</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>90</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 18, times open parenthesis, 100 minus 18, close parenthesis over 90" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>18</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>90</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.18 times, open parenthesis, 1 minus 0.18, close parenthesis over 90" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.18</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.18</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>90</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
